se.sics.tasim.tac03.aw

Class ManufacturerInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.sics.tasim.aw.client.InfoViewer
      • se.sics.tasim.tac03.aw.ManufacturerInfo

  • public class ManufacturerInfo
extends InfoViewer
    The ManufacturerInfo is a simple viewer for displaying information about a manufacturer agent in TAC03 SCM games/simulations.
